response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $10,000. Considering both the quality and the importance it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at an attractive cost while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 9500}
